title: NEL service delay due to train fault at Outram

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于欧南路列车故障，南北线服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan NEL tertunda kerana kerosakan kereta api di Outram
title_translations.ta: அவுட்ரம் ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக NEL சேவை தாமதமானது

updates.text: 0830hrs NEL train service is running normally

0820hrs NEL service towards HarbourFront NE1 is delayed due to a train fault at Outram NE3. Additional travel time of about 10 minutes may be expected both bound. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
